  • Method Details

    • convalidateMove

      public void convalidateMove(@NotNull @NotNull List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws NoValidMoveException, NullTileException
      Check if the move selected by the player is playable.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of the tiles that the player wants to take.
      Throws:
      NoValidMoveException - exception thrown if the move isn't valid.
      NullTileException - exception thrown if the player wants to take a tile from an empty cell.

    • checkRefill

      public void checkRefill(Bag bag) throws CantRefillBoardException
      Check if there isn't playable move left on the board.
      Parameters:
      bag - it contains all the tiles left for the game.
      Throws:
      CantRefillBoardException - exception thrown if there aren't enough tiles in the bag to refill the board.
